identity.name: MOKAMMEL MORSHED

roles.name: Student
roles.desc: Currently studying Urban and Regional Planning at KUET

roles.name: AI Tools
roles.desc: Using AI for planning, coding, design & copywriting

identity.tagline: I bring together urban planning and future-focused technology. My work blends spatial thinking with practical skills in AI — including generative tools (ChatGPT, Gemini), computer vision, automation, and data-driven workflows.Alongside this, I have experience in modern Web Development, UI design, SEO, content creation, and productivity systems. I’m also skilled with tools like React, Canva, Photoshop, Word, Excel, and Notion.Through my portfolio, I aim to showcase not just what I’ve learned, but also how I apply technology to solve real-world planning and communication challenges.

projects.title: Responsive Student Portfolio
projects.summary: A fully responsive personal portfolio website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project showcases student achievements, projects, and contact information with a clean UI and mobile-friendly design.

projects.title: Urban & Planning Cover
projects.summary: Designed visually appealing cover pages for Urban & Regional Planning reports using Canva and Adobe Photoshop. Focused on layout, typography, and thematic color balance to make academic work more engaging.

projects.title: Urban Heat Map
projects.summary: The project uses remote sensing and interactive web maps to analyze urban heat island patterns, visualize temperature distribution, and support climate-resilient, sustainable urban planning with scientific data.

skills.name: ArcGIS Pro
skills.details: Buffer/clip, ModelBuilder basics, layout production; tracked maps and feature classes.

skills.name: QGIS
skills.details: Plugins, field calculator, styling and print layouts.

skills.name: Leaflet
skills.details: Custom markers, popups, tile layers & controls.

skills.name: Microsoft Word
skills.details: Styles, TOC, track changes, citations; academic doc workflow.

skills.name: PowerPoint
skills.details: Grid layouts, master slides, morph, timings.

educationHelp.title: Need Tutor?
educationHelp.text: KUET URP undergrad with hands-on GIS/RS & Web-GIS. I help with concept → practice, assignments, and exam prep. Short, focused lessons; notes & datasets included.
